channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- AIX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- AIX

item.title: CVE-2023-45168|2024-08-02T20:14:19.863Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 267966.

item.title: CVE-2023-40371|2024-08-02T18:31:53.641Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1's OpenSSH implementation could allow a non-privileged local user to access files outside of those allowed due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 263476.

item.title: CVE-2023-45167|2024-08-02T20:14:19.770Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's 7.3 Python implementation could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267965.

item.title: CVE-2023-45165|2024-08-02T20:14:19.780Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2 and 7.3 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX SMB client to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267963.

item.title: CVE-2023-28528|2024-08-02T13:43:22.622Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 251207.

item.title: CVE-2023-45169|2024-08-02T20:14:19.732Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the pmsvcs kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267967.

item.title: CVE-2023-45170|2024-08-02T20:14:19.875Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the piobe command to escalate privileges or cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267968.

item.title: CVE-2023-45175|2024-08-02T20:14:19.860Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the TCP/IP kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267973.

item.title: CVE-2023-26286|2024-08-02T11:46:23.878Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX runtime services library to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 248421.

item.title: CVE-2023-45172|2024-08-02T20:14:19.728Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in AIX windows to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267970.

item.title: CVE-2023-45171|2024-08-02T20:14:19.817Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267969.

item.title: CVE-2023-45174|2024-08-02T20:14:19.804Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the qdaemon command to escalate privileges or cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267972.

item.title: CVE-2023-45166|2024-08-02T20:14:19.981Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the piodmgrsu command to obtain elevated privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 267964.

item.title: CVE-2023-45173|2024-08-02T20:14:19.764Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the NFS kernel extension to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 267971.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-07-23T17:02:15.061Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.title: CVE-2024-25021|2024-02-22T11:39:41.641Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX 7.3, VIOS 4.1's Perl implementation could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 281320.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-05-07T20:17:47.250Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.title: CVE-2024-27260|2024-06-04T17:47:20.145Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX could 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1 allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 283985.

item.title: CVE-2024-27260|2024-08-02T00:27:59.799Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX could 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1 allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 283985.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-08-02T00:27:59.896Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.
